title.text: Service Pack 1 for Forefront Identity Manager 2010 R2 - Service and Portal Language Pack (KB2814853)

description.text: This is Service Pack 1 for the Forefront Identity Manager 2010 R2 Service and Portal Language Pack.  This update also fixes a signing issue described in Microsoft Security Advisory 2749655, which affected hotfix rollup package KB2734159 (build 4.1.2515.0).
